name: Honey Infused Hair Repair Serum
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: A clinically proven hair serum to repair damage, seal split ends, & prevent breakage, while locking in moisture with encapsulated honey & plant-based keratin...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Dryness.- Shine..Key Benefits:.- Deeply hydrates, repairs dry, damaged hair, and strengthens to prevent future breakage.- Smooths & moisturizes to seal split ends.- Protects against heat damage and UV rays..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Plant-Based Keratin: Repairs damage, seals split ends, & strengthens to prevent damage..- Encapsulated Mirsalehi Honey Droplets: Deliver a burst of long-lasting moisture and shine..- Heat & UV Protection: Defends against heat damage & UV rays to prevent color fading & restore resilience...What Else You Need to Know: This clinically proven formula harnesses the power of plant-derived keratin, which gently, yet effectively penetrates the hair shaft to repair damage, seal split ends, & strengthen, while pure encapsulated honey & hydrating oils burst upon application to lock in moisture & shine, sealing in reparative benefits for long-lasting results. Added UV and heat protection up to 450u00b0F protect against breakage and color fading...Research Results: After just one use:.- Delivers 5x more moisture & smoothness.- Repairs & strengthens damaged hair.- Seals split ends by 94%.- Visibly reduces breakage.- 450u00b0F protection..*Based on an independent lab study using scientifically proven instrumental testing...Fragrance Description: Delicate, sweet notes of honey blend into spring florals inspired by our Gisou Mirsalehi Bee Garden....
ingredients: Aqua (Water/Eau), Propanediol, Coco-caprylate/Caprate, Betaine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Mel* (Honey/Miel), Propolis Cera* (Propolis Wax/Cire de Propolis), Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Tocopherol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Sprout Extract, Caesalpinia Spinosa Fruit Pod Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, Maltodextrin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Chlorphenesin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Glucose, CI 40800, Limonene**, Linalool**, Hexyl Cinnamal**, Coumarin**..* Honey & Propolis sourced from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden / Miel & Propolis des ruches du jardin Mirsalehi..** Naturally occurring allergens / Allergenes naturels....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: - Dispense the serum into your palm and gently rub hands together.- Apply onto damp hair.- Work through the lengths, concentrating on the ends.- Dosage depends on the thickness and length of the hair, start with one dropper and use more as needed.- Do not rinse...Pro-Tip: .- After styling, follow with 2-3 drops of the bestselling Honey Infused Hair Oil from mid-lengths to ends to smooth frizz & boost hydration and shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and didn't use it right away.  The sample size was a tiny bottle, perfect for travel so I decided to throw it into my toiletry bag while packing for a trip.  After washing my hair and using this product just one time, my hair felt amazing & shiny, not weighing it down or feeling clumpy like some other products. I love it so much, I'm going to order a full size!     To give some idea about my hair condition: I have thick, slightly wavy, just past shoulder-length color treated hair (highlights), dark brown hair with blondish highlights and regular touchups at the roots.  About twice per year I get my highlights redone.  My hair has gotten drier from color treatments and some of the products I was using seemed to weight my hair down, and with my workouts 5 times per week, i use dry shampoo, and doing my best not to do a full wash/blow dry/heat treatment more than once per week.  Despite all of that, still some dryness.

reviews.review_title: The secret to stronger, shinier hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Honey Infused Hair Repair Serum by Gisou is a must-have for anyone seeking stronger, shinier, and healthier hair. This lightweight serum is packed with nourishing ingredients that instantly revive dry or damaged strands.  After just a few uses, my hair felt softer, smoother, and noticeably less prone to breakage. It adds the perfect amount of shine without making my hair feel greasy, and the honey scent is absolutely heavenly!  I love how versatile it isu2014you can use it on damp hair for hydration or on dry hair to tame frizz and add shine. It's truly a miracle product for keeping your hair looking its best!

I originally bought it because I needed a heat protectant that didn't have a strong smell because So I boyght it and it works so good with my frizzy hair. And it will make your hair so soft. Buy rn!!it gives me headaches.

reviews.review_text: I love this Serum. It will always be a favorite of mine, however I tacked off a star because of the price. It is quite expensive. It smells good, leaves your hair soft and smooth. Recommend if you can afford it <3. I use this after I shower with the Gisou hair oil/Olaplex on days I use my Airstrait.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product!!!!! I 10/10 recommend, my hair is so much more strong and hydrated because of it. It also smells amazing<3

reviews.review_title: i like it, but i get why people don't
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i've been using this product for a little under a year now, so here's my pros and cons:  PROS: - saved my (straight, medium thickness) frizzy hair - satisfying to pop the capsules  - smells like heaven  - you don't need to use a lot, just use it on the parts where you mainly have frizz - pretty packaging  CONS: - stupidly expensive (i recommend getting it on the gisou website, they have better deals and packages) - dropper is annoying/you can't get to the bottom of the bottle to reach extra product - the gold part on the top tends to scratch really easily for me - the bottle is small for what you pay for  TIPS: - don't use too much! you (probably) don't want your hair to end up crunchy - use this right after washing your hair - i recommend using an oil after you hair is dry to seal in all the moisture - only get this if you have the budget or get a great deal, there are probably better products for cheaper prices - remember to make sure all the capsules are popped before putting on hair  anyways, those are my opinions! you are beautiful and i hope this helped ud83eudd0d

I only use this product maybe twice a week because it is pricey but I have seen some results so I will continue to use this product along with other Gisou products!pricey

reviews.review_title: 5/5 stars with the correct usage *read review*
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this because it protects hair up to 450 degrees and I got tired of trying heat protecting sprays and other serums because the products are either to heavy or not as heat protecting as I want.  Its been AMAZING and will be a repeat purchase until I die. However, this product should be used post shower with a styling tool or blow-dry to get the results you expect. This won't do much if you don't apply the correct amount of serum per your hair density and hair type. I have LONG, THICK, WAVY hair and I noticed that after the shower, if I apply one dropper to 6 sections of hair, my hair can go literally 5 days without a wash because my hair stays perfect. If you pair this with a blowout, you hair will look perfect for a few days without the damage or salon costs.  Since using this product, my hair: rarely ever dry - stays shiny and protected for multiple days its less tangled protects my hair when I heat blowdry seen less split ends.   This serum isn't going to magically fix your hair if your hair if your hair has major problems, however with good application, it can mitigate damage while protecting the hair state you currently have.  cons/problems to consider:  1. the more hair you have, the more you need to use and 45 dollars can be a lot of money if buying on a regular basis. 2. The dropper can be annoying because to get the full amount you need to squeeze it twice 3. this is a long, skinny, glass cylinder - if you knock over this thing, she will roll and might break - please be mindful.  Would rate this a 4.5/5 because of cons, but since it really works for me I'm bumping it to  a 5/5. Feel free to give this a buy - just to try out.  xoxo babes, hope this review helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just finished using 1 whole bottle and have not noticed a different in my hair! 0/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely give one star review but this product deserves it. This was one of the worst hair products I've even bought. I tried this out for two months and it does absolutely nothing. I tried to use it on its own, mixed with leave-in conditioner, and as part of my hair mask but it doesn't seem to do anything. The packaging is pretty, but it's not functional and my dropper broke towards the end of two months leaving glass in the container. I've never hated a product this much. Given how much it costs and how little you get, I would honestly stay far away from it. There are much better hair products on the market that are way cheaper. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I play swim for a couple of hours every day along with playing water polo for a couple of hours later in the night, and my hair has never been so shiny, fast-growing, and healthy. I always get asked how my hair is so healthy even though I am mainly in the pool for most of the day, and I give full credit to this product. Also, I noticed my baby hair growing quicker than it ever has before since I started using this product a couple of months ago. However, the price is a little high for the product, but if you are willing to spend the money, it is worth it. This product is so great that every time I go to Sephora to restock it's always sold out, probably because of how good it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm one of those girls who has frizzy hair that's actually wavy when given the right treatment. This has been a game changer for me. Since adding this into my routine, my hair has appeared to change texture. I know that's not technically possible, but that's how it seems. It's softer, less frizzy, and way, way shinier. I blow dry my hair every time I wash it and I've never been able to have same day non-frizzy hair until now. I also live in a wet climate which my hair doesn't love. Now, I can wash and blow dry my hair when it's raining out and it's literally not a problem in terms of frizz. Yeah, the amount of product you get for the price is not that much, and I have to use a lot for my long hair. But it's so worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product and hoped it would work, I've been using it regularly and as directed/suggested but I could tell from 1st use that this wasn't doing anything. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this product especially for the price point.

reviews.review_title: HG once you figure out how to use it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I want to say that I paid for this product with my own money and did NOT receive it for free for review. Overall I love this hair serum. At first it took a while to figure out how to use it, but once I did, it is now HG status. The key for me was to use it as a u201cboosteru201d to my current leave in conditioner. Adding a couple drops of this to my leave in turned it to my leave in on steroids. My hair is now shinier, stronger, and less frizzy. It also retains hydration for longer and my ends are way softer when before they were damaged and dry. Using this on its own may not give you the results you want, however trust me when I say to add a couple of drops of this to your already existing leave in - I promise you will not be disappointed !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this serum! Works as advertised. I air dry my hair and was pleased to see that I had less frizz than when I use my usual products. My hair also feels more clean, and the lightweight texture of this product is perfect for embracing my natural waves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving this hair serum! It's not too sticky but sticky enough to hold my curls. My hair feels soft, doesn't look dry and it smells incredible. I loved it has UV protection to protect it from the sun and the environment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not very oily which was surprising. I like it, it smells good! It does seem to go down fast though if you have long hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: wasting money, make my hair heavy and oily, doesn't do anything good to my hair, really disappointed and the pipe glass easily brokeud83eudd72

reviews.review_text: It doesn't  do anything. Before and after pictures are  off because u201cafteru201d ones are of  hair that has been heat styled. Even the hair oil just sits weirdly on top of hair. Ingredients are not good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the original Gisou oil and was fascinated by this serum's looks, so I decided to try it. I followed the recommended 'How to use', but didn't see any effect. However, it fits nicely into a routine for wavy hair because it is a bit sticky, and holds curls

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing serum for split ends. Must be used on wet hair in order to lock in moisture. Do not use if you have fine oily hair. It is for people with dry, damaged, coarse hair. I feel like a lot of these reviews are from people who don't actually have dry hair and are expecting it to magically change their texture or do something it doesn't claim to do like add volume or make it softer. It is a very strong treatment so only use it when needed. For me, that's after a wash. I use a shine spray or light hair oil for in between washes to style/smooth strays etc.

reviews.review_title: Buy the other hair oil from Gisou
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't really do a difference if you were to get a hair oil definitely get the other one they offer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used lots of Gisou products and unfortunately they all do nothing for my hair. I feel the brand has great marketing and gets u201cover hypedu201d because these products leave my hair feeling like theirs a film left on it. I don't get much moisture out of the products. The honey hair mask is the only product I would kind of recommend and even then you can get other masks for cheaper.

reviews.review_title: Don't fall for influencer brands like Gisou
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from a friend and had to return it unfortunately. This did nothing for my hair and is such a waste of money.
